page.title: 20GROVE LANDMARKS / CREDITS
page.content:
The main landmarks of the area are the Church,with its steeple,the War Memorial,overlooking the village road and north of the Church,and the Garden Centre.The War Memorial commemorates the fallen in both the 1914-18 and 1939-45 wars.Throughout the area there are mature trees,including Oak,Ash, Horse Chestnut and Sycamore.Many of these grow on the original Grove Estate.
The Grove information was produced by Michael Beeby,Nigel Etherington,James Helliwell,Charles Johnson,Neil Lane, Helen Malin,Jenny Manning,Adrian Mcdonald,Simon Richardson,and George Thomson,all of Orchard School,Retford.
